features.title: Affordable For All
features.description: Our course prices are designed to fit everyone's budget. We've made sure that affordability is at the heart of what we offer.

features.title: Lifetime Access
features.description: Enjoy the perk of lifelong access to all our courses. This means you can learn at your own pace, on your own terms, wherever suits you best. No rush, no deadlines.

features.title: Video Lectures
features.description: Dive into learning with our awesome video lessons. They're super clear and easy to grasp, making your learning experience way more valuable.

features.title: Learning on the Go
features.description: Discover learning your way with our easy website and app. Access resources anytime for ultimate learning flexibility.

features.title: Doubt Solving
features.description: Harness the potential of our interactive community forum for answers to all your queries. Become part of a supportive learning community, where assistance awaits at every step of your journey.

features.title: Interactive Learning
features.description: Beyond just video lectures, you'll also unlock a treasure trove of additional resources like quizzes and notes. These valuable tools are here to enhance your learning experience.

features: Six classical schools of Hindu philosophy (Darshanas)
Deep exploration of Upanishadic wisdom and teachings
Interactive learning with renowned philosophy scholars
Comprehensive study materials and reading lists
Lifetime access to all materials and updates
Master certificate for completing the entire bundle

data.title: Sanskrit Basics Package
data.subtitle: Complete introduction to Sanskrit language and grammar
data.description: Master the fundamentals of Sanskrit with interactive lessons, pronunciation guides, and expert guidance from Sanskrit scholars.
features: Interactive Sanskrit lessons with audio pronunciation
Complete grammar foundation from basics to intermediate
Devanagari script mastery with writing exercises
Live Q&A sessions with Sanskrit scholars
benefits: Build vocabulary for reading classical texts
Access to exclusive Sanskrit learning community

testimonials.name: Dr. Sarah Johnson
testimonials.content: This course provides an excellent foundation in Sanskrit. The interactive lessons make learning enjoyable and effective.

testimonials.name: Michael Chen
testimonials.content: Learning Sanskrit has deepened my understanding of yoga philosophy. The course structure is perfect for beginners.

testimonials.name: Priya Sharma
testimonials.content: The pronunciation guides and interactive exercises made Sanskrit accessible. Highly recommended!

faq.question: Do I need any prior knowledge of Sanskrit?
faq.answer: No prior knowledge is required. This package is designed for complete beginners.

faq.question: How long does it take to complete?
faq.answer: The package is designed to be completed in 3 months with regular study, but you have lifetime access.

faq.question: Will I get a certificate?
faq.answer: Yes, you will receive a certificate of completion upon finishing all courses in the package.
